string-array.name: kpiRPS
string-array.item: Appointment as Adjunct/Honorary/Visiting Professor, Visiting Fellows, etc
Appointment as Chairmanship/ Committee/ Reviewer in professional bodies/ associations/ Editorial Board Member

string-array.name: measures1_2
string-array.item: Total no. of ISI publication Clinical and Science category -ISI only Non-Science Category - ISI/Scopus
Other Publications(chapter in book, scopus, conference proceeding, technical report, policy, newspaper/magazine, newsletter)

string-array.name: measures1_3
string-array.item: Total no. of Academic as Principal Investigator

string-array.name: measures1_4
string-array.item: Total no. of academic staff apply FRGS /External public grants

string-array.name: measures1_5
string-array.item: Total no. of other IPR (Other than patent) eg: trademark, industrial design,circuit,software, lyric, poems, new microbial spesies,new plant variety,utility innovations,geographical indication, layout design,teaching aids,copyrights etc.)

string-array.name: measures2_1
string-array.item: No. of appointment as Adjunct/Honorary/ Visiting Professor, Visiting Fellows, etc

string-array.name: measures2_2
string-array.item: No. of Appointment as Chairmanship/ Committee/ Reviewer in professional bodies/associations/ Editorial Board Member at National level in current year

string-array.name: measures2_3
string-array.item: No. of Appointment as Chairmanship / Committee Member/ Reviewer in professional bodies/associations/ Editorial Board Member International level in current year

string-array.name: measures3_1
string-array.item: No. of Recognition and Award received by student (i.e. certificate of appreciation, trophy, sport achievement, community service, panel of jury, consultation skill, expert panel in mass media, etc.)

string-array.name: measures3_2
string-array.item: No. of External Recognition and Award received by Staff (i.e. certificate of appreciation, trophy, sport achievement, community service, panel of jury, consultation skill, expert panel in mass media)
